narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Big Horn Enterprises, INC is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Thermopolis, WY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $25.1M in Medicaid payments across 18K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $25.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
